name: Club Information
body:
OSU App Club
========
A place for you to come learn, work, and even play with mobile applications. We will be working primarily with iPhone/iPad apps, but [Ryley](https://github.com/ryleyherrington) is going to be there to help with Android development.

Current Notices
===============
Check out the [Upcoming Events](https://github.com/OSU-iOS-App-Club/ClubInfo/blob/master/UpcomingEvents.md) for some of the things in the works.

How to Join
===========

1 Join the mail list
  * A key way we get in contact with eachother is through the email list. It is very important that you sign yourself up to recieve these messages.
  *  Signup on this page: http://lists.oregonstate.edu/mailman/listinfo/iphone

2  Come to a meeting
  * Meeting times haven't been decided for Fall 2013 yet, but there will be an email and this website will be updated. Here is the [doodle](http://doodle.com/ru2kfzdkwgvqku56) for the fall term meeting.

Questions
=========

If you ever have any questions, feel free to send the group an email with iPhone@lists.oregonstate.edu or to me (Chris) directly at vandersc@onid.oregonstate.edu
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
